page.title: 01THE DESIGNATED AREA.
page.content: The block studied covers a portion of {rural SW.Cheshire.The area is sparsely {populated with two small villages and {four hamlets.}Wrenbury is more densely populated than Marbury.The volume of traffic is greater and it benefits from more ameneties.Both have Anglican churches and primary schools.There are {no classified roads.}A railway crosses the area but the local station is outside the study area.The land is intersected by the{Shropshire Union {Canal}and though popular for holidays is no longer used for freight.{Tourism centres on canal users and those arriving by car.Most of the land is gently undulating, used as pasture by the many{dairy farms}which are famous in this area.No other industry exists, but limited part time work,mainly for women is available as domestic help,in the shops, public house and schools.
